alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:56AM CDT until July 21 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSAGE COUNTY... At 555 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of Grainola to 5 miles southwest of Barnsdall, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Pawhuska... Barnsdall... Wynona... Avant... Grainola... Foraker... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Tallant... Pershing... Nelagoney... Wolco... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
